name: Liiv
description: Liiv automates property management for housing authorities. We leverage software to streamline HUD compliance, manage tenant vouchers, improve communication, and eliminate inefficiencies in affordable housing management.
one_liner: Liiv automates property management for housing authorities. We leverage software to streamline HUD compliance, manage tenant vouchers, improve communication, and eliminate inefficiencies in affordable housing management.
location: Garden City Park, New York, United States
